proposals.title: Digital Land Registry System
proposals.author: Tech Community
proposals.summary: A blockchain-based land registry system to eliminate fraudulent land transactions and provide transparent ownership records across Bangladesh.
proposals.problemStatement: Land disputes account for over 70% of civil litigation in Bangladesh. Fraudulent documents, multiple ownership claims, and lack of digitized records lead to corruption, violence, and economic losses estimated at billions of taka annually.
proposals.proposedSolution: Implement a blockchain-based digital land registry that provides immutable records of land ownership, transaction history, and automated verification. The system will integrate with existing government databases and provide public access to verified land records.
technicalArchitecture: Blockchain: Hyperledger Fabric for permissioned ledger

implementationPhases.description: Pilot in one district with digitization of existing records
Expand to 5 major districts with public portal

proposals.budgetEstimate: Initial pilot: ৳50 crore, Full implementation: ৳500 crore
expectedImpact: Save citizens billions in legal fees

proposals.title: Transparent Public Procurement Platform
proposals.author: Anti-Corruption Coalition
proposals.summary: An open-source e-procurement system that ensures transparency in government purchases, from tender announcement to contract completion.
proposals.problemStatement: Public procurement in Bangladesh is plagued by corruption, bid rigging, and lack of transparency. Studies estimate that 10-25% of procurement budgets are lost to corruption annually.
proposals.proposedSolution: Create an end-to-end digital procurement platform that automates the entire procurement lifecycle with built-in transparency mechanisms, audit trails, and public oversight features.
technicalArchitecture: Backend: Python Django with REST APIs

implementationPhases.description: Core platform development and pilot ministry
All government bodies and local governments

expectedImpact: Save ৳5,000+ crore annually from reduced corruption
Increase SME participation in government contracts
Improve public trust in government spending

proposals.title: Telemedicine for Rural Bangladesh
proposals.author: Digital Health Initiative
proposals.summary: A comprehensive telemedicine platform connecting rural patients with specialist doctors, including AI-assisted diagnosis and medicine delivery integration.
proposals.problemStatement: Over 70% of Bangladesh's population lives in rural areas with limited access to quality healthcare. There is only 1 doctor per 2,000 people, and specialist care is concentrated in urban centers.
proposals.proposedSolution: Develop a telemedicine platform with video consultations, AI symptom checker, electronic prescriptions, and integration with local pharmacies for medicine delivery to rural areas.
technicalArchitecture: Mobile App: React Native for cross-platform

implementationPhases.description: Platform development and pilot in 2 upazilas
Expand to 20 upazilas with pharmacy integration

expectedImpact: Provide healthcare access to 50+ million rural citizens
Early detection of diseases through AI screening

proposals.title: Open Education Platform for Bangladesh
proposals.author: EdTech Volunteers
proposals.summary: A free, open-source educational platform with curriculum-aligned content in Bangla, supporting students from primary to higher secondary levels.
proposals.problemStatement: Quality education remains inaccessible to millions due to economic constraints, geographic barriers, and shortage of qualified teachers. Private tutoring creates inequality.
proposals.proposedSolution: Create a Khan Academy-style platform in Bangla with video lessons, interactive exercises, and progress tracking aligned with the national curriculum.
technicalArchitecture: Content: Video hosting on cost-effective CDN
Database: MongoDB for flexible content structure
expectedImpact: Free quality education for 10+ million students

risks.mitigation: Peer review system and expert validation
Low-spec device optimization, school computer labs
